title: Hubble Spots a Supernova
summary: The subject of this NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope image is a supernova-hosting galaxy located about 600 million light-years away in the constellation Gemini. title: ESA Awards Thales Alenia Space €862M Argonaut Moon Lander Contract
summary:
The European Space Agency has awarded a €862 million contract to Thales Alenia Space to build the Descent Element of the agency’s Argonaut Moon lander. Designed as a multi-role lunar lander, Argonaut consists of three main elements: the Lunar Descent Element (LDE), the Cargo Platform Element, and the Payload. The LDE is responsible for transporting […]
